modName: Als Shadow Walk - Automatic Invisibility While Sneaking
summary: A cheat that makes you automatically "invisible" whenever you're in sneak mode.
descriptionHtml:
Yes, this is a cheat. I suppose it's a crapshoot as to which category is better for it, Cheats or Stealth, but oh well. This mods adds the ability to craft [b]Spell Tome: Shadow Walk[/b] at any blacksmith forge, for 1 gold. Once you have the tome, read it like you would any other spell tome, and you will gain the constant ability Shadow Walk.

Once you have this ability, from now on, [b]whenever you go into sneak mode, you will turn invisible for as long as you are sneaking, and will turn visible again when you stand up[/b]. This does NOT cost any magicka. You can attack things and activate things, but you will still remain invisible. In that sense, the invisibility is more like the Chameleon effect from [i]Morrowind[/i] and [i]Oblivion[/i].

Please note, you will NOT literally be invisible. Your body will not disappear; HOWEVER, to NPCs, you are invisible. [b][i]NPCs will not be able to see you, but you will still be able to see your body.[/i][/b] The only thing you will notice, is a little flash whenever you enter and exit sneak mode. This signals the "invisibility" turning on and off.


[b][u]OTHER MODS BY ME[/u]:[/b]

5. [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/30915]Als Vault of the Old Slayer -- Requires All 10 Dragon Claws[/url] -- [i]modestly sized dungeon rewarding the completionist player who collects all Dragon Claws in vanilla Skyrim with fantastic amounts of treasure[/i]
